course.title: MAT 1303 Mathematical Methods III (3 units)
course.desc: Sequences, series, power series, Taylor series. Difference equations: the general solution of linear equations with constant coefficients. Additional techniques of integration. Improper integrals. Chain rule for functions of several variables. Gradient, Directional derivative, tangent plane. Partial derivatives of higher order. Extreme with or without constraints.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 1300. MAT 1302 is corequisite to MAT 1303. The courses MAT 1303, MAT 1322, MAT 1325, MAT 1332 cannot be combined for units.
